mapper.select: select seq_org.nextval from dual
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_org values (#{orgNo}, #{orgId}, #{orgPw}, #{orgName}, #{orgBiznum}, #{orgPhone}, #{orgEmail}, #{orgAddrMain}, #{orgAddrDetail}, #{orgIntroduce}, #{orgAccount}, #{orgAccountBank}, sysdate, 36.5, 0, null, null)
mapper.select: select org_no as orgNo, org_pw as orgPw, org_name as orgName, org_status as orgStatus from tbl_org where org_id = #{orgId}

select org_no as orgNo, org_id as orgId, org_name as orgName, org_biznum as orgBiznum, org_phone as orgPhone, org_email as orgEmail, org_addr_main as orgAddrMain, org_addr_detail as orgAddrDetail, org_introduce as orgIntroduce, org_account as orgAccount, org_account_bank as orgAccountBank, org_temperature as orgTemperature, org_thumb as orgThumbPath, org_url as orgUrl, org_status as orgStatus from tbl_org where org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_org set org_name = #{orgName}, org_biznum = #{orgBiznum}, org_phone = #{orgPhone}, org_email = #{orgEmail}, org_addr_main = #{orgAddrMain}, org_addr_detail = #{orgAddrDetail}, org_introduce = #{orgIntroduce}, org_account = #{orgAccount}, org_account_bank = #{orgAccountBank}, org_url = #{orgUrl} where org_no = #{orgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_no AS alarmNo, a.member_no AS memberNo, a.biz_no AS bizNo, b.biz_name AS bizName, a.alarm_type AS alarmType, a.alarm_date AS alarmDate, a.alarm_read AS alarmRead FROM tbl_alarm a JOIN tbl_donate_biz b ON a.biz_no = b.biz_no WHERE b.org_no = #{_parameter} and a.alarm_type not in (1,2,5)

select biz_name as bizName, to_char(biz_donate_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizDonateEnd, to_char(biz_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizEnd, payout_status as payoutYN from tbl_donate_biz d left join tbl_admin_payout_history p on d.biz_no = p.biz_no where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_end >= sysdate and biz_status = 1 and (payout_status is null or payout_status = 0) order by biz_end
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo}
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 0
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 2
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 and to_char(biz_donate_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > to_char(biz_donate_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > to_char(biz_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
select count(*) from tbl_donate_biz left join tbl_admin_payout_history using (biz_no) where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 and payout_status = 1

select donate_code as donateCode, donate_ctg as donateCtg, count(donate_code) as codeCount from tbl_donate_code left join tbl_donate_biz using (donate_code) where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 group by donate_code, donate_ctg order by donate_code

select biz_goal as bizGoal, sum(donate_money) as donateMoney from tbl_donation_list left join tbl_donate_biz using (biz_no) where org_no = #{orgNo} and to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') > to_char(biz_donate_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by biz_goal

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select biz_no as bizNo, biz_name as bizName, to_char(biz_donate_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizDonateStart, to_char(biz_donate_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizDonateEnd, to_char(biz_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizStart, to_char(biz_end, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as bizEnd, biz_goal as bizGoal, sum(donate_money) as donateMoney, payout_status as payoutYN from tbl_donate_biz left join tbl_donation_list using (biz_no) left join tbl_admin_payout_history using (biz_no) where org_no = #{orgNo} and biz_status = 1 group by biz_no, biz_name, biz_donate_start, biz_donate_end, biz_start, biz_end, biz_goal, payout_status order by bizDonateStart desc, bizDonateEnd desc) a ) where rnum between 1 and 5
select count(*) from tbl_org where org_status in (0,1,2)

select org_no as orgNo, org_id as orgId, org_name as orgName, org_biznum as orgBiznum, org_phone as orgPhone, org_email as orgEmail, org_addr_main as orgAddrMain, org_addr_detail as orgAddrDetail, org_introduce as orgIntroduce, org_account as orgAccount, org_account_bank as orgAccountBank, org_enroll_date as orgEnrollDate, org_temperature as orgTemperature, org_url as orgUrl, org_thumb as orgThumbPath, org_status as orgStatus from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select * from tbl_org WHERE org_status IN (0, 1, 2) order by org_status ) a ) a where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
